title: This past weekend, The Reefs entered three intrepid teams in the 2013 Island Challenge charity race...

object.content: This past weekend, The Reefs entered three intrepid teams in the 2013 Island Challenge charity race. The event is a 5k run around the dunes and beaches of Horseshoe Bay and involves completing 20 challenges along the way, including 25 foot wall climbs, tunnels, high wires, ocean swims (or wading at least!), monkey bars and the local army's obstacle course. Coupled with driving rain and 40 mph winds, it was a grueling experience but all three teams performed admirably and finished in one piece (with one or two scrapes and bruises!) It was a great day for Team Reefs and raised money for some fantastic local charities. If any guests want to join us next year, you are more than welcome!! You can find more on the event at www.islandchallenge.org.
